summary: Jonathan plays Gotcha with fellow college students, testing ability as assassin or mark, using paintball guns on campus. He flies to Paris on vacation and, with a woman taking his virginity, on to Berlin, where the game/ammo gets real.

keywords: soviet union|college campus|tag the game|reference to james bond|kgb
title: ¡Te pillé! Gotcha!
